briefTitle: Glutamate for Metabolic Intervention in Coronary Surgery

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* surgery for unstable coronary artery disease (unstable angina, non-STEMI)
* accepted for surgery \< 2 weeks after STEMI
* coronary surgery for indications above performed with or without cardiopulmonary bypass
* coronary surgery for indications above with or without simultaneous valve procedure

Exclusion Criteria:

* informed consent not possible because of critical condition or other reason
* preoperative use of inotropes or mechanical circulatory assist
* preoperative dialysis
* redo-procedure
* unexpected intraoperative finding / event that increased the dignity of the procedure to overshadow the originally planned operation
* body weight \> 125 kg
* food allergy known to have caused flush, rash or asthma

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Perioperative Myocardial Infarction, Postoperative Heart Failure or Postoperative Mortality
Degree of Perioperative Myocardial Injury
outcomeMeasures.description: p-CK-MB postoperative day 1, p-troponin-T postoperative day 3

outcomeMeasures.title: Postoperative Hemodynamic State
outcomeMeasures.description: Mixed venous oxygen saturation (SvO2) measured at weaning from cardiopulmonary bypass and on arrival to ICU

outcomeMeasures.title: Postoperative Hemodynamic State in Patients With Severely Reduced Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF<0.40)
outcomeMeasures.description: Hemodynamic instability despite inotropes or need for IABP at the end of surgery in patients with severely reduced left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF\<0.40)

outcomeMeasures.title: Postoperative Renal Function
outcomeMeasures.description: maximum p-creatinine value recorded postoperatively \< 30 days

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postoperative Stroke < 24 Hours
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of Postoperative stroke \< 24 hours of surgery verifed by CT-scan

outcomeMeasures.title: Atrial Fibrillation
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of patients with atrial fibrillation recorded postoperatively

outcomeMeasures.title: Severe Circulatory Failure in CCS Class IV Patients
outcomeMeasures.description: Severe circulatory failure according to prespecified criteria as judged by a blinded endpoints committee in CCS class IV patients

outcomeMeasures.title: 10-year Survival
outcomeMeasures.description: 10-year survival - related to intervention. Last follow-up August 3, 2022. Follow-up time ranged from 12.7-16.8 years.

outcomeMeasures.title: Postoperative Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: Postoperative mortality within 30 days of surgery
